name: The professor and his child
description:
A game that tell us a story of Professor.Shaw and his kid John, They lived in 2090.

John currently about to die because of uknown viruses, so Prof.Shaw try to make some food that can save his kid. But, to make that food. He must fight a mutant so he can get the main Ingredients, its Mutant Blood. So he make a time machine and he go to Planet Garoth12 at 2020. After he goes to that planets, he must kill all the mutant. By killing all the mutant, he gained mutant blood. Can Prof.Shaw make it?

Basic Control : A D or Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to jump, G to deploy yellow chemicals materials, F to deploy blue chemicals material, H to deploy red chemicals material
